intro:
Run the store, stock the shelves, serve the customers!
Organize, upgrade, and grow your supermarket empire!
From carts to checkout, be the boss of your own store!
description:
Supermarket Simulator Store Game 3D

Step into the shoes of a supermarket manager and experience the thrill of running your own store. Stock shelves, organize products, serve customers, and keep everything running smoothly. Every decision matters — from managing inventory to handling busy checkout lines.

Features

• Realistic 3D supermarket environment
• Easy to learn, fun to play for all ages
• Manage stock, upgrade your store, and expand your business
• Handle customer requests and keep them satisfied
• Perfect for short play sessions or long, immersive gameplay

Supermarket Simulator Store Game 3D lets you enjoy the satisfaction of managing your very own supermarket. Can you become the ultimate store manager?
